string.value: You don't appear to be in any games right now...
{0} has started a game! use /join to get in on the fun.... and probably die :P
A new game has been started by {0}! Use /join to be eaten!
{0} has started a chaos game! use /join to get in on the fun.... and probably die :P
A new chaos game has been started by {0}! Use /join to get eaten!
You can't join now! The game is already running.
You've already joined!
1 minute left to /join
{0} seconds left to /join
Not enough players, cancelling game!
Game is starting, please wait while I assign roles and update the database.
{0} is banned for attempting an exploit (no names starting with /)
{0}, please change your name to join
Sorry, max player limit has been reached!
{0} has joined the game. {1} players, {2} minimum, {3} max
{0} click this: {1}, then click start. Until you do, I cannot tell you what your role is.
You can't run away! YOU'RE DEAD! Get back in the ground.... jeez, zombies these days
{0} has fled in terror!
{0} players remain.
Hey I didn't ask you anything yet!
You don't seem to be playing...
I can't find a player by that name!
This answer is not valid!
{0} has voted to eat {1}
{0} has voted to lynch {1}
{0} has not voted 2 nights in a row. The forces of good have seen this as a terrible crime, and {0} suddenly falls, dead. {1}
You traitor!!! You are now the wolf..
Choice accepted
\nThe seer is {0}
{0} was the seer. As the apprentice, you step up to become the new seer.
{0} was an apprentice, and has now stepped up to fill {1}'s place as the new Seer.
You see {0} is {1}!
Who do you want to lynch?
Who do you want to detect?
Who do you want to shoot? {0} bullet(s) remain
Who do you want to visit?
Who do you want to see?
Who do you want to guard?
Who do you want to eat?
Who do you want to hunt?
Who is your role model?
Who do you want to convert to your order?
Make sure you discuss with {0}
and
You are cursed. You are a villager at this time, but if the wolves choose to kill you, you will instead become a werewolf yourself.
You are the detective. During the day, you may choose a player to reveal their role. However - in doing so, your role could be revealed to the wolves! (40% chance)
Congrats! You're the village drunk! (and really, everyone knows it...)
You are the Guardian Angel. Each night, you may choose a player to save. However, if you choose a wolf, there is a 50% chance you will die.
You are the gunner. You have two bullets. During the day, you may choose to shoot another player. Everyone will hear the shots, and know you are the gunner (not a wolf).

You are the Harlot. During the night, you may choose to visit another player, to verify if they are not a wolf. However, if you visit a wolf, or visit someone killed by the wolf, you will die. If you do go to visit though, and the wolf tries to kill you at your home, you will survive.
Traitor! For now, you are a villager, but once all the wolves die, you will become a werewolf. If the seer looks to you, you may or may not be identified as a wolf.
XD YOU ARE A WOLF!! (good on ya) Each night you can choose to kill someone.
You are the seer. Each night, you may choose a player to 'see', and their role will be revealed to you.
You are a lowly villager, doomed to spend your days in a field and possibly eaten.
You are the tanner. If you get lynched, you win automatically!
You are a wild child! Pick a player to be your 'role model' - if they die, you become a werewolf.
You are the beholder, you will be told who the (real) seer is - that is your only function.
You are the apprentice seer. If the (real) seer dies, you will take their place as the seer.
You are a cultist. Every night, you may choose a player to convert to your cult. If all remaining living players at the end are cultists, they win.
There is a cultist in the town, trying to convert everyone! Each night, you can choose a player. If they are a cultist, they die. If the cult tries to convert you, the newest member dies.
Dusk draws near, and the villagers gather to decide who they are lynching this evening... Everyone now has {0} seconds to vote!
It is now day time. All of you have {0} seconds to make your accusations and defenses or just talk.
Night has fallen. Everyone heads to bed, weary after another stressful day. Night players: you have {0} seconds use your actions!
The villagers have cast their votes, amid doubts and suspicions. {0} is dead. {1}
Unable to come up with a proper decision on who to lynch, the mob returns to their homes for the night, frustrated...
Something is fishy, for no one voted! No lynchmob tonight.....
The villagers gather in the morning, but do not see {0}. They wander over to the house, to find {0} disemboweled, an old badge shoved down their throat.
Morning comes, and to everyone's dismay, impaled on top of the church's cross is {0}, the Guardian Angel.

As everyone comes out of their houses, they find pieces of a shotgun strewn about... then legs... then fingers... then the body of {0}, floating in the fountain in the town square, dead from a werewolf attack. You have lost your gunner.
The villagers awake in the morning, to find the disemboweled remains of {0} haunched over an ouija board and tarot cards. The Seer is dead.
Everyone wakes to the smell of burning alcohol and wood... The pub is on fire!!!! After putting the fire out, the crispy remains of {0} are found, torn apart...
As the sun rises above the village, they find {0} sitting over an ouija board, but with a deck of... bicycle playing cards??? WHAT A FOOL!
As everyone rises in the morning, they smell a terrible stink. They follow the smell to find {0} shredded apart in the pig pen, head missing. NOMNOMNOMNOM {1}
A noticeable stench is coming from {0}'s house... the village inspects it to find a body lying in front of a dark altar... a cultist has been killed by the hunter!
The villagers gather the next morning in the village center, to sighs of relief - it appears there was no attack the previous night.
You have been killed by the wolves. As you were cursed, you have now become a wolf!
Your wolf counterpart(s): {0}
{0} was bitten... but was cursed and became a werewolf! Congrats on your new teammate!
Oh no! The wolves ate you. NOMNOMNOMNOM
Oh no! {0} was a drunk! Now you are drunk, and can't attack tomorrow night..
You tried to guard a wolf! The wolf has eaten you.
You have saved {0}'s life!
{0} was not attacked, so you didn't do much of anything.
You went to guard {0}, but they weren't home!
A guardian angel was watching over you last night, and fought off the wolves!
The harlot decided to take the wrong night off, and stayed home. {0} has been eaten by the wolves!
Odd... {0} was not home! No dinner for you...
You slip into {0}'s house for a little fun, only to be confronted by a wolf. You are dead.
{0} slipped into the wrong house last night! Their well known remains are found pinned to the church doors with an iron rod... how sad :(
{0} slips into {1}'s house, ready to have a little fun to ease off the stress. However, they instead find a werewolf eating {1}! The werewolf quickly turns on {0} and jumps... {0} is dead.
You see {0} is not wolf, as they cuddled with you all night long!
It was a bit dark, so you couldn't see well enough, but in the middle of the night you wake up, the harlot cuddling you. When day breaks they slip back out silently...
You caught {0} snooping about! They are the detective
Your snooping has shown you that {0} is {1}
Looks like {0} didn't enjoy a night with the Harlot! The gunner got revenge. {1} is dead.
Suddenly, a shot rings out. The village turns to see {0} standing over {1}'s body, a gun still aimed at the head. {2}
The werewolf has won!
The werewolves have won!
The villagers have won! All the wolves have died...
Oh no! You lynched the Tanner! He wins the game, silly.
Remaining living players, roles, and team:
{0} has voted to convert {1}
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... however, they were the cult hunter! {0} is dead!
{0} came to your house last night, ready to convert you... but you shoved your sword right through the evil cultist. A cultist is dead... {1} remain!
The cult has converted you to their order! You are now a cultist. Every other night, you will have a chance to convert another player.
Cultists: {0}
{0} has joined the cult!
{0} was sent to do your dirty work, and convert {1}... but no one was home!
All the wolves have died, and the only people left standing have all been converted to cultists.. The cult has won!
You went to hunt {0}, but they are already dead!
You go into {0}'s house, and find them praying before an altar to some unknown god... You quickly slide your sword right through the evil cultist.
You go to {0}'s house, but there is no mysterious chanting. They are not a cultist, so you return home.
{0}'s role model just died! In their rage, they have become a werewolf!
{0} has died! In your rage, you have become a werewolf! Your new teammates are: {1}
a Villager 👱
the Drunk 🍻
the Harlot 💋
the Seer 👳
the Traitor 🖕
the Guardian Angel 👼
the Detective 🕵
a Werewolf 🐺
the Cursed 😾
the Gunner 🔫
the Tanner 👺
the Fool 🃏
the Wild Child 👶
the Beholder 👁
the Apprentice Seer 🙇
a Cultist 👤
the Cultist Hunter 💂
Ran away
💀 Dead
🙂 Alive
Players Alive
a Mason 👷
You are a Mason. If there are any other masons, you will know who they are. Otherwise, you are a villager.
As everyone rises, they find the body of {0} shoved into a pile of stone, blood splattered everywhere. One of your masons has died!
The masons are: {0}
Your newest member heads over to {0}'s house to convert them, but instead finds the house a complete wreck, blood everywhere, and bits of wolf fur snagged on the doorway...
The pack heads to {0}'s house to eat them, but they are met by a tall dark figure, armed to the teeth. The Guardian Angel fights everyone off, and you head back defeated.
